Title: Increases the amount of money a retired police officer may earn in a position of school safety officer to $32,500
Summary: Increases the amount of money a retired police officer may earn in a position of school safety officer to $32,500.
LawCode: Amd ยง212, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to the employment of retired police officers
